name: Five Nights In The Void (A FNAF Clone)
name_original: Five Nights In The Void (A FNAF Clone)
description:
If you die you have to close and re-open the program :) (it's intentional btw)

If you are looking for a fresh fnaf game (in 2022 for some reason), then you have come to the right place!

Content Includes:

- 6 Nights

- Secrets

- New Ideas to the FNAF formula

- Geo Characters

- A new art style with mixed quality

Thanks for downloading! This was made in scratch :)
